messages.title: Getting things done for you
messages.content: Dear Postal Voter, Any day now you'll be receiving your Postal Votes which will entitle you to have your say in who will represent you as your local Councillor and your Member of Parliament. This election is closer than any in living memory and it is vital that you use both your votes to make sure you choose who you want to represent you.
We're writing to urge you to vote Labour in both elections so that we can continue to work hard together to support you and your family.

Don't forget that with Labour older people receive the £400 winter fuel allowance and Labour families benefit from tax credits, help from Sure Start and child trust funds to give families a better future.

We want to make sure that here in Irwell Riverside we continue to invest in our housing, our schools, our health services, and make sure that the police and PCSOs receive the support to help keep our streets safe.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour families benefit from tax credits, help from Sure Start and child trust funds to give families a better future.
To invest in housing, schools, health services, and support the police and PCSOs in Irwell Riverside.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election is closer than any in living memory.

issues.socialWelfare: Labour older people receive the £400 winter fuel allowance.

housing.content: To continue to invest in our housing to help keep our streets safe.
